MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Cordero Project in North America dated May 2013.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Cordero Project in North America dated May 2013.pdf
document.description: This report provides a comprehensive update on the mineral resources of the Cordero Project in Chihuahua, Mexico, including geological setting, mineralization, exploration activities, and updated resource estimates as per the standards of NI 43-101.
